decisions.description: Key Phrases should create various case types: "Billing" - Create Billing Issue case "Repair, Trouble Ticket" - Create Repair case "Move, Change, Disconnect" - Create Order Creation case V26 - "CSR, Inventory" - Create Account Activity case with Case Reason(Case_Reason_Other__c) as CSR If these key words are not found, create Account Activity case which is already set in the Email-To-Case settings for Enterprise.Customer.Support@ftr.com
decisions.name: Subject_Key_Phrase
decisions.label: Subject Key Phrase

Flow.description: V14: Implemented condition to skip sending emails if a Queue owns the case. V15 - Assign to CSAM queues only if Auto Assignment Using Assignment Rule is checked (Account Activity, Order Creation and Repair). - By Omar V16 - Call omni channel flow for skill based routing for Salesforce Admin cases - By Omar V17 - Send TNAC Case Close Email Notification - By Mahesh's team - This has overwritten V16 change which added in V18 with other changes V18 - Assign to CSAM queues only if Auto Assignment Using Assignment Rule is checked for Billing Issue similar to V16 change also consider PTO while checking active CSAM. Send CSR survey. Change Record Type based on the subject key phrase for Email To Case. - By Omar V19 - If there is no contact on External Support case record, don't send the CSR survey instead send an email notification to Mithu. - By Omar V20 - Passing Case Id to put it on Survey Subject. - By Omar V21 - Create a task to the case owner's manager if the case owner had not responded to the customer's inquiry in time. - By Omar V22 - Adding for Account Activity Entitlement. - By Omar - Adding for Circuit, Disconnect, First Bill Review, Risk and UC Network COE-CPE Entitlement. - By Omar - Adding Repair case record to send the CSR survey (In "Is CSR Survey Eligible?" diamond). - By Omar - Adding cases with origin as Email To Case to send the CSR survey (In "Is CSR Survey Eligible?" diamond). - By Omar V23 - Populate account field for audit case when oppty is there for audit cases V24 - Added Send Email action to Email-To-Case creator V25 - Send Email action to Retention for High Value MRR at Risk Cases - By Yasin (Case# 01183543) V26 - Added keywords for Account Activity for Email-To-Case. For CSR or Inventory on Subject then set the Record type to Account Activity and Case Reason(Case_Reason_Other__c) to CSR - By Omar (Case# 01195247) - Removed Repair case from sending the CSR Survey out to - By Omar (Case# 01192161) - Assign corresponding support agent as owner based on the Support Agent field on Account object - By Omar (Case# 01202582) - Assign corresponding queue as owner based on the Support Territory field on Account object - By Omar (Case# 01180777) - Support Agent will take preference over Support Queue - Close child cases with reason from parent when a parent case is being closed - By Omar (Case# 01193276) - High MRR Converted from 5k to 2k

formulas.name: Case_Close_EmailBody
formulas.expression: 'Case #' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ' has been closed. Please click on the link below to view the record.' &BR() + LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_470, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_470)) + {!$Record.Id}

formulas.name: Case_New_EmailBody
formulas.expression: 'Case #' + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + ' has been created. Please click on the link below to view the record.' &BR() + LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_470, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_470)) + {!$Record.Id}

formulas.description: Return true if the Case Owner is a user.
formulas.name: forB_IsTheOwnerAUser

formulas.description: Returns true if ( RecordType = 'Risk') AND ( Estimated MRR at Risk is greater or equal to $5000 )
formulas.name: forIsMRRHigh

textTemplates.name: textT_E2CBody
textTemplates.text:
Thank you for contacting Frontier Enterprise Customer Support. We have created Case: {!forT_CaseNumber} and will begin processing your request as soon as possible. Your assigned Support Agent will be in contact soon and we look forward to servicing you.


Thank You,

Your Frontier Enterprise Customer Support Team.

textTemplates.name: textT_HighRiskMRR
textTemplates.text:
A risk case has created or Modified to have Estimated MRR at Risk greater or equal to $5000.

Here is the case number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}


Thanks!
